org.jbiowhtools.examples

Class FrecPathGeneNeighbors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbiowhcore.utility.AbstractDefaultTool
      • org.jbiowhtools.AbstractDefaultTools
        • org.jbiowhtools.examples.FrecPathGeneNeighbors

  • public class FrecPathGeneNeighbors
extends AbstractDefaultTools
    Given a protein, what are the most frequent pathways in its chromosomal neighbors (+/- 3) in bacteria?

    The homologs of a protein will be approximated by its UniRef clusters (100%, 90% or 50% identity). To make the query, we have to specify the % identity level. Then the database should retrieve all UniRef neighbors of the protein, retrieve all of their +/- 3 neighbors, map them to pathways and make a list of pathways, sorted by frequency $Author: r78v10a07@gmail.com $ $LastChangedDate: 2013-05-29 11:24:54 +0200 (Wed, 29 May 2013) $ $LastChangedRevision: 835 $
    Since:
    Aug 29, 2012
